payload.i: REMEDIATE mode flow (Load findings -> Diagnose -> Fix -> Verify).
payload.pb: Provide CAC-native steps to systematically resolve BLOCKER/MAJOR findings.

lex.R1: Load Evidence: Identify the latest evidence bundle at `evidence/rfc/{RFC_ID}/reviews/rfc_review_*.yaml`; load ALL findings associated with this verdict into the remediation session (do not filter by severity).
lex.R2: Run Council: Spawn SA-1/2/3 to jointly Diagnose (Mode 41) and Design Fixes (Mode 70) for all findings, ensuring consensus on the remediation plan.
lex.R3: Diagnostic (Mode 41) & Design Fix (Mode 70): Execute the remediation plan derived by the council; must respect `02_design_decisions`.
lex.R4: Apply Fix: Execute file edits on tickets or RFC YAMLs.
lex.R5: Verify (Mode 8): Check if fix introduces new issues (Counterexample); re-run specific gate if deterministic.
lex.R6: Emit Bundle: Generate new evidence bundle to `evidence/rfc/{RFC_ID}/reviews/rfc_review_{timestamp}.yaml` with finding statuses updated to RESOLVED_PROVISIONAL.

q: New bundle emitted with RESOLVED statuses
